msg.spa: Hi @contact.prepiloto_nombre ,  in 2 days on the day of the @(DAY(contact.prepiloto_remnextapptdate4)) you are booked for a visit to the clinic. Remind them that they should measure the depth of your uterus. This is an important and standard way to confirm the baby is growing as normal.
After your visit, we will check with you how your visit it went. It is very important for us to understand the quality care you recieve and this feeds in to the evaluation of the doctors.
